reviews.review_msg: Wants you to repeat his opinion back to him. Avoid. Sought help and found him to be condescending and useless.

You don't suppose professors actually look at these entries do you?  I suppose they do.  Roxanne is splendid.  An excellent balance of all things I value in a professor.  If you're reviewing this to determine if she will give you an easy mark, she won't; and you should drop out of school.
